intro: The v-badge component superscripts or subscripts an avatar-like icon or text onto content to highlight information to a user or to just draw attention to a specific element. Content within the badge usually contains numbers or icons.

custom.heading: Customization options
custom.intro: The v-badge component is flexible and can be used in a variety of use-cases over numerous elements. Options to tweak the location are also available through the offset-x and offset-y props.

notifications.heading: Dynamic notifications
notifications.intro: You can incorporate badges with dynamic content to make things such as a notification system.

hover.heading: Show on hover
hover.intro: You can do many things with visibility control, for example, show badge on hover.

tabs.heading: Tabs
tabs.intro: Badges help convey information to the user in a variety of ways.
